pkgmetadata.longdescription: Experimental Data of Cascade Experiments in Genomics // These experimental expression data (5 leukemic 'CLL' B-lymphocyte of aggressive form from 'GSE39411', doi:10.1073/pnas.1211130110), after B-cell receptor stimulation, are used as examples by packages such as the 'Cascade' one, a modeling tool allowing gene selection, reverse engineering, and prediction in cascade networks. Jung, N., Bertrand, F., Bahram, S., Vallat, L., and Maumy-Bertrand, M. (2014) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btt705.
